{{TPRGT Story
|character          = Yelan
|date               = 2023-04-20
|zh                 = 
;今天是夜兰的生日哦，我们快去为她庆祝吧！
:'''旅行者：'''就是这里了吧，岩上茶室招待员说的位置。
:'''派蒙：'''这么晚了约在这里相见，还让我们带上留影机，好神秘…
:'''派蒙：'''知道了，是不是为我们准备了什么惊喜？
:'''夜兰：'''——来的正好。
:'''派蒙：'''哇，是夜兰！
:'''夜兰：'''嘘，别把「惊喜」吓跑了。
:'''旅行者：'''留影机和备用胶卷就位，保证不遗漏任何细节！
:'''派蒙：'''庆功宴食材——香辛果就位！
:'''夜兰：'''那么现在就等好戏开场了。
|dialogue_review_zh = 「那么现在就等好戏开场了。」
|en                 =
;Today is [[Yelan]]'s birthday, let's go and celebrate with her!
:'''Traveler:''' This should be the place that the attendant from [[Yanshang Teahouse]] was referring to.
:'''Paimon:''' Paimon can't believe someone would ask us to come here this late at night with a [[Kamera]]... So mysterious...
:'''Paimon:''' Paimon knows! Did someone prepare a surprise for us?
:'''Yelan:''' &mdash;You're right on time.
:'''Paimon:''' Whoa, it's Yelan！
:'''Yelan:''' Shh. Don't scare away the "surprise" now.
:'''Traveler:''' A Kamera and a spare roll of film &mdash; check! We promise we haven't left out any important details! 
:'''Paimon:''' Victory feast ingredients &mdash; [[Harra Fruit]]s, check!
:'''Yelan:''' Well then. Just sit back and enjoy the show.
|dialogue_review_en = "Well then. Just sit back and enjoy the show."
}}
